description:
A replacement latex wrist gasket for your drytop or drysuit.

  • Fits most drytops and drysuits, including all the drytops sold by MEC
  • We recommend using Aquaseal® glue to seal your new wrist gasket to your drytop or drysuit
  • Sold individually
name: Kokatat Latex Wrist Gasket - Unisex
